Reviews.Title: Regret Purchase, Avoid Same Mistake
Reviews.Author: Ed Muzik
Reviews.Content: Bought this product in April 2012, less than a month later the picture went dark and after much hassle JVC repaired it free. Fast Forward 1 year to May 29, 2013 same symptoms, but this time JVC will not not repair as past 1 year warranty ( though less than year after motherboard replaced). Regret purchase, advise others to avoid same mistake.

Reviews.Title: BIG DISSAPOINTMENT
Reviews.Author: C.D. STAXX
Reviews.Content: The first one I bought didn't work. JVC customer service not much help either. The second one lasted 9 months and died. No more JVC for me

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: tuff stuff
Reviews.Content: Tv was easy to set up and worked perfectly. No problems so far!  Have had no reason to regret the purchase.
